resources.string: Sort Me! is a game where you sort as many tiles as you can under two minutes.
Each row of tiles must be sorted in Ascending order from left to right. Only one tile can be swapped with another at a time. Drag a tile over another tile to swap their positions.
There are also powerups which can be used to boost your gameplay:
Shuffles the tiles of an opponent randomly.
Make an opponent only able to swap adjacent tiles for some time.
Adds two cards to an opponent\'s next deck. Extra cards earn no points.
Blocks all attacks form all opponents for some time.
The opponent that is targeted by the indicator will be attacked upon activating an offensive powerup.
Powerups cost MP, which can be earned by swapping tiles. \nUse them wisely!
